body.string: {"model":"gpt-4o","max_output_tokens":128,"temperature":0.0,"stream":true,"input":[{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"input_text","text":"Where am I located?"}]},{"type":"function_call","call_id":"MpfiuoRaM","name":"get_location","arguments":"{}"},{"type":"function_call_output","call_id":"MpfiuoRaM","output":"Seattle, WA, USA"}],"instructions":"You are a helpfull assistant who answers questions succinctly.","tools":[{"type":"function","name":"get_location","description":"The get_location tool will return the users city, state or province and country."}]}
